title: Wedding Script
content:
Ok. Iâ€™ve gone cross-eyed. Does anyone know the name of this wedding script?

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193745im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_6413.gif)
author: typesetter1

comments.content:
Bickham Script, from Adobe.

- Mike Yanega

Here is a sample from the Script Font ID Guide showing the Swash initial used by your sample. You must have OpenType savvy applications to access them.

- Mike Yanega

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193745im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bickham-Alternates_6100.gif)

I thought I had seen it before. How did I miss that one?

Thanks
